          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Hur ofta? Hur länge? 1</string>
            <string language="en">How often? How long? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie häufig? Wie sehnen Sie sich? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combien de fois ? Combien de temps ? 
1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como frequentemente? Quanto tempo? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ogni quanto tempo? Quanto tempo? 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόσο συχνά; Πόσο καιρό πολύ; 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo a menudo? ¿Cuanto tiempo? 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">En övning där man tränar på olika sätt att uttrycka tid.Modul 5 - Vem är du? - Fritid.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">An exercise where you practice in different ways to express time. Module 5 - Who are you? - Recreation. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">adverbial</string>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Übung, wo Sie in den unterschiedlichen 
Methoden, Zeit auszudrücken üben. Modul 5 - Wer sind 
Sie? - Erholung. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un exercice où vous pratiquez dans différentes 
voies d'exprimer le temps. Module 5 - Qui êtes-vous ? 
- récréation. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um exercício onde você pratica em maneiras 
diferentes expressar o tempo. Módulo 5 - Quem são você?
- recreação. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'esercitazione dove vi esercitate in nei modi 
differenti esprimere il tempo. Modulo 5 - Chi sono voi? 
- ricreazione. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια άσκηση όπου ασκείτε με τους διαφορετικούς τρόπους
να εκφραστεί ο χρόνος. Ενότητα 5 - ποιοι είναι εσείς; 
- Αναψυχή. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ejercicio donde usted practica de diversas 
maneras de expresar tiempo. Módulo 5 - ¿Quiénes son 
usted? - reconstrucción. Safir.</string>
          </description>
